title: What colors does the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Series come in?
content:
Along with the Galaxy S22 series of smartphones, Samsung has also announced its latest flagship tablet lineup — the Galaxy Tab S8, Galaxy Tab S8 Plus, and Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra. Over the years, Apple’s iPad has maintained its dominance in the flagship tablets category. If there’s one brand that has been competing with Apple

The post What colors does the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Series come in? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: These are all the colors in which the new Samsung Galaxy Tab S8, Galaxy Tab S8 Plus, and the Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra will be available in.
